    def test_reg(driver, user, pwd, confirm, expected,request):
        page=IndexPage(driver)
        page.open()
    
        def do_test():
            reg_result=page.reg(user, pwd, confirm)
            assert reg_result == expected
            result = query_user_and_password(user, pwd)
            if reg_result:
                # 驗證是否寫入資料庫

                assert result[0] == user
                assert result[1] == pwd
            else:
